info.name: AutoIdleOnAFK
info.description:
Automatically updates your discord status to 'idle' when you haven't opened your discord client for more than 5 minutes.
Plugin only works when your status is 'online' and you are not in a voice channel. 

For Bugs or Feature Requests open an issue on my Github

changelog.title: What's New?
items:
Now you can choose if the plugin will change your status only from "Online" or from all the status.
*[default: only from "Online"]*

Updated time limits, now they are from ~~5 minutes~~ **1 minute** to ~~30 minutes~~ **12 hours**.
*[default: 5 minutes]*

Now you can choose the status for when you come back to your pc.
*[default: "Online"]*

changelog.title: Fixed issues
items: Now the plugin will correctly save the settings.
Now your status will correctly set as "Online".

changelog.title: Removed:
items: You can no longer set "Invisible" as status to set when you are back.

changelog.title: Credits:
items: All these features have been added by Haxurus.

defaultConfig.name: Change Status To:
defaultConfig.note: the status selected will be switched to when AFK. default: Idle

defaultConfig.name: AFK Timeout (minutes)
defaultConfig.note: minutes to wait before changing your status to Idle/Invisible

defaultConfig.name: AFK Timeout (minutes)
defaultConfig.note: hours to wait before changing your status to Idle/Invisible

defaultConfig.name: Back To Online Delay (Grace/Cooldown Period)
defaultConfig.note: seconds to wait before changing your status back to Online. if you close or unfocus discord window, status will not be changed

defaultConfig.name: Always Revert To Online
defaultConfig.note: Come back online even if this plugin didn't change your status. Useful for multiple devices.

defaultConfig.name: Show toast messages?
defaultConfig.note: toggles the visibility of "Changing status back to online" toast message

defaultConfig.name: Change status only from "Online"?
defaultConfig.note: change your status only if you are actually "Online"

defaultConfig.name: When you return, set status to:
defaultConfig.note: the status selected will be switched to when you will be back. default: Online
